mapper.insert: INSERT INTO groupInfo (groupName, goal, groupDesc, startDate, endDate, userID) VALUES (#{groupName}, #{goal}, #{groupDesc}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{userID});
INSERT INTO groupUser (userID, isAdmin, groupID) VALUES (#{userID}, #{isAdmin}, #{groupID});
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT groupInfo.id FROM (groupInfo INNER JOIN user ON groupInfo.userID = user.id) WHERE groupInfo.groupName like CONCAT('%',#{searchValue},'%') OR groupInfo.goal like CONCAT('%',#{searchValue},'%') OR user.nickName like CONCAT('%',#{searchValue},'%') GROUP BY groupInfo.id) subquery;

SELECT groupInfo.id AS id, groupInfo.groupName AS groupName, groupInfo.goal AS goal, user.nickName AS nickName, count(groupID) AS userCnt FROM ((YeeunJ.groupUser as groupUser INNER JOIN YeeunJ.groupInfo as groupInfo on groupUser.groupID = groupInfo.id) INNER JOIN YeeunJ.user as user on groupInfo.userID = user.id) WHERE groupInfo.groupName like #{searchValue} OR groupInfo.goal like #{searchValue} OR user.nickName like #{searchValue} GROUP BY YeeunJ.groupUser.groupID ORDER BY
groupInfo.groupName groupInfo.regDate desc userCnt desc
groupInfo.regDate
LIMIT #{s_point}, #{list};
mapper.update: update groupInfo set startDate=#{startDate}, endDate=#{endDate}, groupDesc=#{groupDesc} where id = #{groupID}
